title: Italianissimo 1: beginners: a BBC course for beginners in italian.
brief_description: Four cassettes which accompany the BBC language program on video. They contain conversations recorded for the television series, explanations and exercises, and additional authentic Italian. The student is encouraged to take part in conversational exercises designed to develop comprehension and vocabulary. The cassettes can be used in conjunction with the tapes and texts or by themselves. The videos and texts are available for loan as separate items.
